title: Couple of serifs
content:
I would like to have ID’s on these typefaces. The samples are quite small, but I hope some of you can make sense of it! Thanks.

1.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/greatideasone3_4571.jpg)
 2. 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/greatideasone6_6533.jpg)
 3. 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/greatideasone7_4373.jpg)
 4. 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/greatideasone9_4883.jpg)
 5. 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/greatideasone13_5602.jpg)

 [‹ Techno-ish Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46879 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need to know this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46864 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Quincunx

comments.content: 1 (the easy one) mantinia, matthew carter, cover design by phil baines
Thanks. I knew it was from Phil Baines. Since it comes from [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419/http:/www.davidpearsondesign.com/greatideasone.html).

I think No. 2 may be [Poliphilus](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084419/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/poliphilus/).

- Mike Yanega

Nos 4 & 5 may be either Bodoni or Walbaum, at first glance. i will need to look at families to see more specific detail for matching versions.

- Mike Yanega
